page.title: 07Jackson's Nurseries Chobham
page.content: These{nurseries}are owned by Mr Tilbury. He owns 41 acres of land and most of this is{grassland,}the grass is made into{hay}and sold to people who own horses. All of the{plants}they grow are grown in{pots}or in the ground in greenhouses. There are 3 big {greenhouses}that are 100' by 60' and one smaller one that is only 60' by 40'. Also they have{shade houses which have a fine green netting which allows only 50% light and 50% shade. In two of their greenhouses they have heaters which are run by oil. There is underground heating under the{cuttings to act as an electric blanket. They deliver their produce to garden shops locally and to wholesalers.
